title: Looking at Power BI Many to Many
excerpt: In this video, Patrick takes a look at Power BI Many to Many relationships. This was part of the July 2018 Power BI Desktop release and can enable some awesome capabilities. Patrick looks at why you may not want to use Power BI Many to Many even though you think you do.  Many to Many documentation:Â https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/desktop-many-to-many-relationships
